reference.title: Tools and Ingredients Needded to Fix a Keurig
reference.shortdesc: Below is everything you will need as you follow along with this set of instructions, as well as the purpose of each one.

property.propvalue: Used to clean the water reservior and removable parts.
This is needed to unclog your Keurig, it cleans out the pipes and inner parts of the device you cannot get to.
This is needed for mixing with the vinegar or descaling solution to unclog the device, as well as rinsing the water resvior and pipes out after descaling. It is easier to do the process near a sink.
Used to dry off everything when finishig this process.
Used to clean the inside of the water reservior, make sure it's non-abrassive so it doesn't damage what you're cleaning.
Used to collect the water during the descaling process. Make sure to use a cup that can handle boiling water.
This is what you're fixing and cleaning so of course you need it.
